name: IntelliCodeTeamModels
description: Train Visual Studio IntelliCode Team Models from Azure Pipelines.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: branch
inputs.label: Branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use this argument if you wish to filter training to an specific branch.

inputs.name: platform
inputs.label: Platform
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional parameter. Defines the project target platform (i.e ARM, Any CPU) for C++ projects.

inputs.name: config
inputs.label: Configuration
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional parameter. Defines the project configuration name (i.e Debug, Release) for C++ projects.

inputs.name: intelliCodeServiceEndpoint
inputs.label: IntelliCode connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional parameter. Defines an account to be linked to the [repository asociated team model.](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/visualstudio/intellicode/custom-models#repository-associated-team-models)
